casebody.data:
Ernest A. HINGLE, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Chalin O. PEREZ et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 29932

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 4, 1970. *1038Benjamin E. Smith, of Smith & Scheuermann, New Orleans, La., for appellant. Sidney W. Provensal, Jr., Marcel Livaudais Jr., of Provensal & Fitzmaurice, New Orleans, La., for appellees. Before BELL, AINSWORTH and GODBOLD, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

We affirm on the opinion of the District Court. Hingle v. Perez, 312 F. Supp. 127 (E.D.La.1970).

Affirmed.
